It was found during inspection on 1/3/13 that the accumulator system has a High Pressure (HP) Shear function on the main station but not at the remote station. When the HP Shear mode is needed to shear the pipe in use, the rig must conduct operations in HP mode, but may conduct tests and functions in normal mode.

CG and ABS Cert Not required - No Safe Welding Area - Rig has subsea BOP stack - DJT

Safe welding area was originally approved by the New Orleans District in 1999. In October 2015 the safe welding area was moved and a submittal was sent to the Lafayette District for approval. After inspecting the safe welding area, the Lafayette District denied the safe welding area approval request. Therefore, the Noble Paul Romano must follow the Operators Safe Welding Plan for all welding and burning operations, per 250.109.

Safe welding area was originally approved by the New Orleans District in 1999. In October 2015 the safe welding area was moved and a submittal was sent to the Lafayette District for approval. After inspecting the safe welding area, the Lafayette District denied the safe welding area approval request. Therefore, the Noble Paul Romano must follow the Operators Safe Welding Plan for all welding and burning operations, per 250.109.

It was found during inspection on 1/3/13 that the accumulator system has a High Pressure (HP) Shear function on the main station but not at the remote station. When the HP Shear mode is needed to shear the pipe in use, the rig must conduct operations in HP mode, but may conduct tests and functions in normal mode.
Any welding performed on the Pacific Sharav will follow Chevron's Welding Plan as approved by the BSEE New Orleans District on May 17, 2017.
